item.title: Ropeat（新規追加）
item.description: Ropeat is a fun top-down shooter in which 2-10 players use their robots’ repeat-mechanic to win: Each player gets copies that repeat exactly what they did a few seconds ago. Plan carefully ahead or just dive into the chaos and win against your friends!
item.content:encoded:
Ropeat is a fun top-down shooter in which 2-10 players use their robots’ repeat-mechanic to win: Each player gets copies that repeat exactly what they did a few seconds ago. Plan carefully ahead or just dive into the chaos and win against your friends!

item.title: 战略三国（新規追加）
item.description: 《战略三国》是一款不抽卡的有创新三国战争策略游戏，所有将领的形象、建筑风格，严格考究文献资料绘制。在这里有庞大的真实城池体系，上千座历史实名城池。即时的指挥，智略的对抗。丰富的锦囊妙计系统，多种计谋的组合使用，战斗的移动指挥，兵种的克制都会改变战局结果。

item.title: 终焉与珑同行（新規追加）
item.description: 《终焉与珑同行》是一段几乎没有剧情的故事。 没有宏伟的冒险、没有奇迹，也没有命运交错。只有在清晨和黄昏之间，反复走过同一段日子。 一起吃饭、说话、沉默，偶尔争吵，偶尔又因为无聊的事笑得喘不过气。 像温水一样的生活，平凡到几乎透明，却又真实得让人想逃。 你总觉得再这样下去，世界也不会改变。但心里某处却在轻轻提醒你——这样下去，不会太久了。 不是因为发生了什么，而是因为什么都不会发生了。 她不会告诉你原因，你也不会问。
item.content:encoded:

item.description: TRUCK TITANS is a high-octane monster truck racing game with 9+ levels of intense action. Customize your truck, pick sponsors, and compete in score attacks and races across city arenas, deserts, and night tracks. Nail stunts, crush obstacles, and become a monster truck legend.
item.content:encoded:
TRUCK TITANS is a high-octane monster truck racing game with 9+ levels of intense action. Customize your truck, pick sponsors, and compete in score attacks and races across city arenas, deserts, and night tracks. Nail stunts, crush obstacles, and become a monster truck legend.
